title: 820-3209 run slowly
message:
I found corrosion arround Q5530. I replaced this and checked it goes to C5411 but still the same.

I measure on C5411 and I have 3V and 0.5V in both pins. This is on the faulty board that run slowly.
On another full working board I have 0.5V in both pins. Any hack I can do? Any idea how to solve that?

Short C5411 will solve the problem?

title: 820-3209 run slowly
message: Why not run ASD so you can see the exact failing sensor?? Could be another killed Q5530, corroded trace, dead U5410, no power to U5410, etc.

title: 820-3209 run slowly
message: ASD error: Motor is spinning slowly as it should

title: 820-3209 run slowly
message: That is not an ASD error......

title: 820-3209 run slowly
message:
U5410 powered with 3.2V
I run ASD test yes and this is the error. No more errors. Any idea?

title: 820-3209 run slowly
message: "Motor is spinning slowly as it should". I have never had ASD tell me that. Picture please.
